entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2 except 6 near Chetwynd. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Periods of snow near the Rockies this evening. Amount 2 cm near the Rockies. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
